repository.name: 10.3 - Main Repository (Sources)
repository.description: The repository of all source packages in openSUSE 10.3. For experts only.

repository.name: 10.3 - Update Repository
repository.description: In this repository you find security and maintenance updates to openSUSE 10.3.

description.repository: The XFCE repository in the openSUSE Build Service, which provides you with the unsupported but latest version of the XFCE desktop environment and software.

repository.name: FACTORY - X11:XGL
repository.repository: This repository contains the latest software that brings you composite effects and technology. It includes Xgl, Compiz, and Compiz Fusion packages maintained by the openSUSE Community.

repository.name: FACTORY - xorg73
repository.description: Provides you with the latest version of the Xorg (display server) 7.3. This repository will change and can break frequently; for experts only.

repository.name: FACTORY - OpenOffice.org
repository.description: Provides you with the latest stable version of OpenOffice.org, the Office suite that openSUSE uses.

repository.name: FACTORY - Mozilla
repository.summary: Most recent builds of Mozilla Software like Firefox
repository.description: Containing the latest releases of all Mozilla software, such as the popular Thunderbird (mail client), Firefox and SeaMonkey (web browsers).

repository.name: FACTORY - Wine CVS Builds
repository.description: Wine is an Open Source implementation of the Windows API, so it allows you to run some Windows applications in openSUSE. This repository provides the latest CVS (development) snapshot packages of Wine.

repository.name: FACTORY - Games (action)
repository.description: Contains several action games including Open Arena (shoot 'em up), Flight Gear (flight simulator) and Torcs (3D racing simulator).

repository.name: FACTORY - Drivers for webcams
repository.description: Contains recent drivers for hundreds of different webcams.

repository.name: FACTORY - Drivers for Wireless LAN
repository.description: Contains up-to-date drivers for Wireless LAN.

repository.name: FACTORY - Virtualization (QEMU)
repository.description: Provides up-to-date builds of QEMU, a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.

repository.name: FACTORY - Virtualization (VirtualBox)
repository.description: Provides up-to-date builds of VirtualBox, a general-purpose open-source full virtualizer for x86 hardware.

repository.name: FACTORY - PHP
repository.description: Provides the latest packages and multiple-version builds of PHP software.

repository.name: FACTORY - Database
repository.description: Latest updates for database software including Firebird and MySQL.

repository.name: FACTORY - Mail Server
repository.summary: Latest updates for postfix, exim and tools around them.
repository.description: Providing the latest updates for postfix, exim and tools around them.

repository.name: FACTORY - KDE:Backports
repository.description: Updates to the KDE software that is shipped with the distribution (backports).

repository.name: FACTORY - KDE:Community
repository.description: Provides additional KDE software maintained by the openSUSE KDE community. This includes filelight, d3lphin, kooldock, and much more.

repository.name: FACTORY - GNOME:STABLE
repository.description: This provides the latest stable, unsupported release of GNOME for openSUSE 10.3.

repository.name: FACTORY - GNOME:Community
repository.description: Updates to the GNOME software that is shipped with the distribution (backports).
